html:
10.10.17  3:20 pm   Do you like SOAP?

     it's ok

10.10.17  3:04 pm   was the part in your outside song where you can't go back to where you come from because you're not welcome and it's not fun there fictional?

     i'm not sure

10.10.17  2:28 pm   How do you pronounce ueqstions? Tell me how to say it like a dictionary does, i.e. large is l-are-g

     questions

10.10.17  2:05 pm   Are you a cowboy?

     i will check

10.10.17  1:59 pm   I think your music is pretty cool. Will you release any albums?

     i think i prefer to release songs indivitually. but all you have to do is just put some of them in a folder, and POW! you've got yourself an album

10.10.17  1:54 pm   Are you inspired by the questions page?

     oh hell yeah

10.10.17  1:32 pm   Are the any animals that humans are descended from that still exist today? Like, is there a sponge species or jellyfish species or something that we branched off from after hundreds of millions of years, but that still is around today?

     oh hell yeah

10.10.17  1:28 pm   10.9.17  6:03 pm does that include a continental breakfast the next morning?

     no

10.10.17  1:27 pm   is life worth it?

     yes

10.10.17  12:58 pm   You misspelled uequstion in the sentence "ask a question". You should have written "ask a ueqstion".

     that's not true

     Correct it and then answer my euqstion: why is the sky blue?

     what color should it be

10.10.17  12:42 pm   AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA okay.

     i know what you mean

10.10.17  12:30 pm   Can you do a song with just piano, multi-tracked vocals and maybe some strings? Just an idea..

     i think i've done that

10.10.17  12:09 pm   hotdogs

     ah, you make an interesting point.

10.10.17  11:30 am   How long would it take for you to come up with another song or make a new video?

     well let's better damn hope 2 weeks

10.10.17  11:12 am   Are you bored like me?

     no

10.10.17  10:39 am   hey bill the button for a new random question moves depending on how long the answer is, could you make it stay in one place? or is it moving all part of the fun?

     great news, i've made a special version just for you.

10.10.17  10:09 am   did you know that for any number that is divisible by nine, when the digits are added up a lot, they become nine. (e.g. 423: 4+2+3 = 9, 423/9 = 47)

     oh hell yeah. i knew all the words to that reggie kathy song when i was 5 years old.

10.10.17  10:08 am   Have you ever thought that maybe all those questions asking if you've ever thought that all of the questions on this page are asked by the same person are asked by the same person?

     you make an interesting point, but i don't think that is a rewarding enough hobby for anyone to do it as consistently and over such a long period of time as i have gotten these questions

10.10.17  10:06 am   How to know if I'm in the future?

     you are

10.10.17  9:00 am   Hi jeff hows life

     hey joe, it's great, thanks for asking

10.10.17  8:34 am   i feel pressured to be weird and unique. what do  i do? best regards, i.

     have you tried being extra normal, like more normal than anyone's ever been before?

10.10.17  7:49 am   what's your philosophy on life?

     seems like it's good idea

10.10.17  4:02 am   will you continue your jazz page?

     it was never discontinued

10.10.17  3:03 am   how can I express myself

     try a way that none of your peers seem to be doing

10.10.17  3:03 am   what's a tree?

     it's like a huge leaf, very strong

10.10.17  2:23 am   Could you show us your writing process sometime?

     sure

10.10.17  2:07 am   Are you allowed to do what you're doing?

     i'm not sure

10.10.17  12:30 am   Someone crashed into my piece of shit car and now it is an even bigger piece of shit. What should I do now?

     become the legend you were always destined to be

10.10.17  12:26 am   Can i expect the new thing tomorrow? (as in 10/10/2017)?

     yes

10.10.17  12:23 am   is going insane sometimes a part of keeping myself sane?

     yes

10.10.17  12:16 am   Have you ever been lonely, but then realized that even if you did somehow manage to meet someone you're romantically interested in, you would probably never even have time to commit to the relationship because you're so fucking busy?????

     yes but wouldn't it be nice to meet someone who could help me with the work and work together with me

10.9.17  11:30 pm   Did you have a music video for We Could Just Get High? I fee like you had one but I keep searching for that and it's nowhere to be found on your website or on Youtube.

     i posted it on youtube as a title video
10.9.17  11:19 pm   If you were a type of bread, what type would you be?

10.9.17  10:39 pm   how's the video coming along

     good

10.9.17  9:52 pm   Do you think a pretty girl could make you regularly use capital letters again?

     i do use capital letters regularly

10.9.17  9:21 pm   "Back to normal" what really do you mean by normal?

     the way the questions page normally looks

10.9.17  9:19 pm   10.8.17  8:34 am why not change the notebook link on your main page to twitter

     because i don't want to have a twitter link on the front page, and the notebook section is actually quite different, although it does include a lot of material which was also used for twitter, especially after 2014

10.9.17  8:33 pm   Seriously do you have a fucking life

     yes, do you

10.9.17  8:18 pm   Do you sing in the shower?

     no

      Any videos of yours where the melody of the music was written while you were in the shower?

     actually when i am writing a song, i might be stuck for a while and the solution very frequently will occur in the shower. for example melody/lyric for "maybe that's just what you're supposed to do" came to me in the shower

10.9.17  7:59 pm   are you continuing the Monday series?

     how about a tuesday series

10.9.17  7:20 pm   would you fuck a pizza?

     i don't think so

      have you fucked a pizza?

     no

10.9.17  7:15 pm   So, correct me if I'm wrong, but I think you said before that you document your thoughts and processes and stuff, then cut and edit down all that documentation

     no, to even listen to all of it would take years

     into your reality videos. Is 'sometimes i whatever' from that same documentation that the reality vids come from,

     yes

     or was that recorded on its own for the video  (I'm guessing the jingle at the end was)?

     after brainstorming the video and coming up empty handed, it occured to me immediately upon pressing the stop button that i should do it based on the rambling phrase that i had come up with in the brainstorm, and that i also would need to include the journal footage to have it make sense. that was really the first time i got a chance to do some playing around with editing that stuff, and including artifacts such as bits of other videos, writing lists, etc. i also would have to decide what 'whatever' was, but that was a no brainer and i figured that out immediately

10.9.17  6:58 pm   Baguette.

     you make an interesting point

10.9.17  6:52 pm   When is your next unboxing video

     when was my previous unboxing video

10.9.17  6:10 pm   do you think people don't stop global warming because they are afraid of the cold

     no

10.9.17  6:03 pm   Price for a one-night stay at "the bracket"?

     75 cents

10.9.17  5:50 pm   what do you do when you have a problem?

     try to understand the problem

10.9.17  5:38 pm   what do you do outside of making videos?

     writing tweets, answering questions, and various other things related to bill wurtz and billwurtz dot com

10.9.17  5:10 pm   are you ever gonna start filming videos ft. The Real Live Bill Wurtz again? (like "i'm sad", "i like", etc.)

     yes

      is the real you missing? 

     no

10.9.17  5:03 pm   julien baker says she does voice memos for song writing too! and that she got that idea from imogen heap! i guess im easily impressed by patterns!

     everybody does it. that's how we write things down in the 21st century
